long_description: Built with an oversize 1.5 in. headtube for improved handling, the Cannondale Trail SL 29er 2 hardtail mountain bike offers fast-rolling 29 in. wheels with Shimano components for good performance. Light 6061 aluminum Trail SL 29er frame features a relaxed geometry for a stable, predictable ride; oversize 1.5 in. headtube improves strength, stiffness and handling. Rear stays are shaped to enhance comfort by damping vibration and lessening the impacts of bumps. RockShox Recon Silver TK suspension fork delivers 100mm of smooth, responsive travel and features easy lockout and rebound adjustment for customizing the ride. Shimano Deore/SLX drivetrain features snappy trigger shifters and derailleurs to make quick work of shifting through the 30 gear combinations. Shimano M446 hydraulic disc brakes feature a 180mm rotor up front and 160mm rotor in the back to ensure powerful, responsive and progressive braking. Burly Alex DC3.0 rims are wrapped with WTB Nine Line tires, which offer a small-block tread for speedy cross-country performance. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required. Specs on the Cannondale Trail SL 29er 2 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
